name: codrops
description: An extensive CSS reference offering way more content than MDN.

name: Can I use
description: Interactive browser support tables for CSS (and HTML5).

name: Introduction to CSS
description: This Screencast series will teach you the basics of CSS in about one hour.

name: The cascade
description: This article explains what the cascade is and how this affects you.

name: Specificity and inheritance
description: Understanding specificity and inheritance is important to master CSS. This article will help.

name: CSS Box Model
description: An article explaining the foundation of layout on the web.

name: Also have a look at the detailed information about the box-sizing property.
The Lengths of CSS
description: Overview covering absolute and relative units.

name: Fun with Viewport Units
description: Imparts the basics and shows some nifty use-cases.

name: Basic CSS Selectors
description: An introducing to the very basic CSS selectors you need to know.

name: Advanced CSS Selectors
description: Level up your knowledge. From attribute selectors to CSS3 pseudo classes.

name: CSS Dinner
description: Learn how to use CSS selectors with this fun little game.

name: CSS Variables: Why Should You Care?
description: A short introduction to CSS variables.

name: Locally Scoped CSS Variables: What, How, and Why
description: Describes the advantages of locally scoped CSS variables.

name: Using CSS variables correctly
description: Patterns and anti-patterns for using CSS variables.

name: Everything you need to know about CSS Variables
description: In depth article going beyond the basics of CSS Variables using real-world examples.

name: Getting Reactive with CSS
description: Mindblowing talk about the possibilities of the combination of CSS variables and functional reactive programming in JavaScript.

name: Learn CSS Layout
description: Learn about CSS layout techniques in 5 chapters.

name: Layout Land
description: Jen Simmons video series about the new CSS Layout possibilities.

name: Laying Out The Future With Grid And Flexbox
description: Introduction of a new layout system encompassing Flexbox, CSS Grid and the Box Alignment Module.

name: Floats
description: In depth information about how to use (and clear) floats.

name: Positioning Types
description: A closer look at a few little-known things related to the CSS positioning layout method.

name: inline-block
description: Shows in which cases it makes sense to use the display property inline-block for layouting.

name: A Complete Guide to Flexbox
description: All you need to know about Flexbox on one page.

name: Flexbox playground
description: Play with Flexbox examples on CodePen.

name: Flexbox Defense
description: A tower defense game in the browser to learn about Flexbox with fun.

name: Flexbox Froggy
description: Learn all the basics of Flexbox with a fun game involving frogs and lily pads.

name: Flexbugs
description: Community-curated list of flexbox issues and cross-browser workarounds for them.

name: Flexbox Zombies
description: A training course driven by a storyline where you use Flexbox and a crossbow to hunt zombies.

name: What the Flexbox?
description: A simple, free 20 video course that will help you master CSS Flexbox!

name: A Complete Guide to Grid
description: All you need to know about CSS Grid Layout on one page.

name: Grid by Example
description: Besides examples of how to use Grid this site also has additional useful learning resources.

name: Designing with Grid
description: Talk about the new layout possibilities CSS Grid is offering.

name: Grid Garden
description: Lovely game where you write CSS code to grow your carrot garden.

name: GridBugs
description: Community-curated list of Grid interop issues and workarounds for them.

name: Grid Critters
description: Learn CSS grid layout by mastering an adventure game.

name: CSS Transitions and Transforms for Beginners
description: An introduction to to CSS transitions and CSS (2D) transforms.

name: All you need to know about CSS Transitions
description: Also addressing advanced topics from chaining and events to hardware acceleration and animation functions.

name: CSS 3D transforms
description: Multi page tutorial with examples like card flip and carousel effects.

name: CSS Animation for Beginners
description: Imparts the concepts of CSS animations with keyframes.

name: animatable
description: Nice little page demonstrating which CSS properties are animatable.
